mapper.select: SELECT fv.id, fv.name, fv.unit, fv.fee_key_id, fk.name AS fee_key_name FROM lease.fee_value fv JOIN lease.fee_key fk ON fv.fee_key_id = fk.id WHERE fv.is_deleted = 0 AND fk.is_deleted = 0 and fv.id in (select fee_value_id from lease.apartment_fee_value where is_deleted = 0 and apartment_id = #{id})
